title: Joined an ARAM game, I never loaded after it opened up the loading page, RIOT HELP
body: So basically I finished champ select and then it opened up the second window, but everyone stayed at 0% despite that I have a stable internet connection where I am right now. I closed it and tried again, but currently am still unable to connect to my game despite nothing wrong from my end.  Attempts to reconnect keep failing, until like 20 minutes into the game

replies.body: It's likely that your network was having problems getting a solid connection to the game server it was trying to link up with. Some good first steps for troubleshooting this is to adjust your port forwarding and DNS options following the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you're not sure of how to update those yourself. Give that a try, and test it in a custom game.
